1: I trust fully and dwell in safety and freedom.
2: Timely rescue keeps life safe and whole
3: I act with integrity and keep clean hands
4: I help the peaceful and even those who oppose me.
5: Welcome fair justice and live with humble integrity.
6: Justice rises delivering fair judgment and lasting peace
7: People unite around justice that rises for their good.
8: I receive fair judgment for my integrity and righteousness.
9: Justice prevails as hearts and minds are fairly examined.
10: Integrity of heart brings protection and rescue.
11: Daily justice favors those who live rightly.
12: I turn and receive guidance, peace, and protection.
13: Timely justice protects the oppressed and upholds accountability.
14: People labor with integrity and produce truth.
15: Kind deeds create safety that returns to the doer.
16: Justice returns each deed to its doer
17: I praise righteousness and sing with joyful gratitude.
